title: Casey Anthony: Where the Truth Lies
overview: A decade after being acquitted of murdering her daughter in a court decision that enraged millions and earned her the "America's most hated mom" moniker, Casey Anthony tells her story in her own words. Through a close examination of her version of events, exclusive interviews with people deeply involved in the case, including the officers who initially charged Casey, and unprecedented access to Casey herself, the series offers a jaw-dropping new perspective on the untimely death of 2-year-old Caylee.
